file_content.text: Havoc? This is Coria, with the Safecrackers. We've got the gap we needed, so we're pulling out.
I don't know what you're doing, but the Imps don't like it. You'll have a lot of company soon--suggest you pull out immediately, over.
We'll head back to base right away.
Sounds good.
The sooner I'm out of this place, the better.
Finally!
I know the feeling, Captain. See you soon--Coria out.
We're doing fine here, Lieutenant. No sense pulling out now.
We'll stay, do some damage.
What? Don't be a hero, sir--get out of there! You'll be completely overrun!
Havoc can take the heat, Coria. Get your people back to base.
We can handle ourselves.
Don't worry about me, Lieutenant. Just get your men home.
I can handle myself.
Whatever you say, sir.
I'm pulling my squad out. We'll meet you back at base, Coria.
You're right.
Copy that. See you at home. Coria out.
I don't need your tactical evaluation, Lieutenant.
Don't tell me what to do.
It's your funeral, sir.
Best of luck--Coria out.
